about.title: Who I am
about.motivation: Hello everyone, I am Serhat, I live in Berlin and I am looking forward to putting my skills from my IT training in the field of frontend into practice.
about.environment: I live in Berlin and can be deployed flexibly - both on-site and remotely.
about.mindset: IT is a field that is constantly evolving and that is exactly what motivates me to learn new things and continuously expand my knowledge.
about.offer: Project after project, I was able to improve my skills. For me, every problem is an opportunity to grow through analysis, a structured approach, and finding practical solutions..

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.description: I am experienced in modern front-end development, specializing in Angular. My skills include building responsive, accessible, and high-performance applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and creating intuitive user experiences. Continuously learning and staying up to date with the latest Angular features and best practices allows me to deliver reliable and future-proof solutions in a fast-evolving digital landscape.
